name: Until Lights Out
description:
Everything was supposed to have been a beautiful Christmas, but it ended up being interrupted by a cursed and unknown curse..
Until Lights Out is inspired by a horror movie story where evil mostly dwells in darkness. A little girl named Claire will go through challenges and through her fears, in search of a possible answer, paranormal activities or just hallucinations, you are alone being watched by an entity whose origin is not known, solve puzzles in search of a truth and try to end the evil.

Main Features

- Small game includes puzzles.
- Explore one of Claire's house.
- The game offers its own atmosphere.
- Inspired by a horror movie
